title: Investigation of the human-gut-kidney axis by fecal proteomics, highlights molecular mechanisms affected in CKD
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Sonnal Lohia, Sophie Valkenburg, Rafael Stroggilos, Vasiliki Lygirou, Manousos Makridakis, Jerome Zoidakis, Francis Verbeke, Griet Glorieux, Antonia Vlahou
